mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asset_detail (asset_id, email, asset_category_code, amount, registered_at, end_date, asset_name, business_type, category_asset_category_code) VALUES (#{assetId}, #{email}, #{assetCategoryCode}, #{amount}, #{registeredAt}, #{endDate}, #{assetName}, #{businessType}, #{categoryAssetCategoryCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE asset_detail SET asset_category_code = #{assetCategoryCode}, amount = #{amount}, registered_at = #{registeredAt}, end_date = #{endDate}, asset_name = #{assetName}, business_type = #{businessType}, category_asset_category_code = #{categoryAssetCategoryCode} WHERE asset_id = #{assetId} AND email = #{email}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM asset_detail WHERE asset_id = #{assetId} AND email = #{email}
